snippet: Luca Paolini used a late solo attack to win the third stage of the Giro d’Italia and take the overall lead from his fellow Italian Salvatore Puccio.
abstract: Luca Paolini wins third stage of the Giro d'Italia bicycle race; other cycling news noted.
lead_paragraph: Luca Paolini used a late solo attack to win the third stage of the Giro d’Italia and take the overall lead from his fellow Italian Salvatore Puccio.

headline.seo: Luca Paolini Takes Overall Lead in Giro D’Italia
headline.main: Italian Takes Overall Lead in Giro D’Italia
